# gsloid: global sea level and oxygen isotope data

The goal of gslic is to make available raw data for sea level curves and d18O curves for the Holocene and most of the Pliestocene. 

## Installation

You can install gslic from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("benmarwick/gslic")
```
